meanings.definition: To make professional or give a professional character to.
meanings.sent1: She professionalized her resume to impress the employer.
meanings.sent2: The company professionalized its services to attract more clients.
meanings.sent3: The cat professionalized its hunting skills to catch the elusive mouse.
meanings.sent4: The sun professionalized the sky with its vibrant colors at sunset.
meanings.sent5: He professionalized his appearance by wearing a suit and tie to the interview.

meanings.definition: To make professional in character, methods, or standards.
meanings.sent1: The school professionalized its teaching methods to enhance student learning.
meanings.sent2: She professionalized her baking skills by attending culinary classes.
meanings.sent3: The clown professionalized his act by juggling with precision and grace.
meanings.sent4: The artist professionalized her painting by incorporating new techniques.
meanings.sent5: He professionalized his communication skills by attending public speaking workshops.
